api_list.name: Read Vault
api_list.description: Returns all Vault keys. This api return keys encrypted.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yardillo.p.rapidapi.com/vault/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yardillo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://yardillo.p.rapidapi.com/vault/{filter}"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yardillo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

test_endpoint.messages: The request to the API has timed out. Please try again later, or if the issue persists, please contact the API provider
test_endpoint.info: Your Client (working) ---> Gateway (working) ---> API (took too long to respond)

api_list.name: Read Case Type
api_list.description: Searches all or specific case type
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yardillo.p.rapidapi.com/casetype/search/all"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yardillo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Search Case
api_list.description: Search your cases by fields id and its values
api_list.code:

url = "https://yardillo.p.rapidapi.com/case/Casetype=simplecase&casestatus=closed"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yardillo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Set DB Connection
api_list.description: This API will set the your own DB connection. All case data will get stored in your own database.

api_list.name: Update Case Type By Id
Update Case
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://yardillo.p.rapidapi.com/case/611960ad8b3d1c3e17aa0977"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "yardillo.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
